law.catch_line: Administrative Modification or Elimination of Conditions of Prior Administrative Approvals.

text.section:
Sec. 33-36.2. Administrative Modification or Elimination of Conditions of Prior Administrative Approvals.
The Director shall approve an application to modify or eliminate a condition of an administrative site plan approval, an administrative approval of a subdivision entrance feature, or any part of any such condition, upon demonstration pursuant to the applicable standards set forth in that the proposed modification or elimination will result in substantial compliance with the requirements of a previously approved administrative action, will correct a clerical or scrivener's error, or is no longer required because the administrative approval has been entirely and voluntarily abandoned.
